name: Helix Tech
description:
Helix Tech is a Mobile First startup headquartered out of goa, yes goa!!! Helping Entrepreneurs & Enterprises Build and Manage Next Generation Mobile Experiences rapidly!
We’re a family of young, enthusiastic and positive individuals. We at Helix Tech work smart and party with passion..! From creating something new and letting our thoughts become things, Big things! Innovation is our business & Optimism is our core.
We’ve Recently Launched Helix Tech LABS a product division of the company Having its Focus on the Internet for the Next Billion in growing markets of Southeast Asia. Looking to Build Apps for the New To Net users in areas of healthcare, Education, Economic Empowerment & Public Utilities.
We Also look at ourselves as a startup for startups. Working with entrepreneurs helping them validate or scale their idea and understand the right product/market fit, To help to achieve this better we’ve Launched Helix Tech for Startups with its flagship product Helix Swift
Originated With Humble Beginnings in an incubator by two IT grads fresh out of college, Now close to under 3 years into operations the company has a strong foothold in the area of Mobility and is looking to expand into Wearables, IoT & Machine Learning. Having its HQ in Goa, A Development Centre in Bangalore and Business Offices in Istanbul & Hanover and soon to open a Full Fledged Europe Business Head Office in London!
We’ve built a great foundation but we’ve only just begun!
